llmReplay.title: Replay LLM Result Parsing
llmReplay.description: Retrieve and display LLM training data for a specific training log entry

messages.idRequired: Please enter a training log ID

deleteClientData.title: Delete Client Data
deleteClientData.warning: ⚠️ WARNING: Delete all client messages and data for the current user. This action cannot be undone!
deleteClientData.confirmation: Are you sure you want to DELETE ALL your client data and messages?  This action CANNOT be undone and will permanently remove all your chat history and client information.

effectiveDelete.title: Effective Account Deletion
effectiveDelete.warning: ⚠️ DANGER: Permanently delete an account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone!

productId.label: Product ID
productId.placeholder: Enter the product ID to delete...
productId.description: The ID of the product/account to be permanently deleted

reason.label: Deletion Reason
reason.description: Explain why this account is being deleted (required for audit trail)

effectiveDelete.confirmation: Are you sure you want to PERMANENTLY DELETE the account with Product ID: {productId}?  This action CANNOT be undone and will immediately delete all associated data.  Reason: {reason}
